job_history.work_description: Connecting with onshore business for review of AUC balance and updating the status of the WBSE's Scheduling Monthly with call with onshore business and Finance / Business leads to update the status of the over expenditure Leading team with regular catch up meeting and allocating the WBS creation request equally and conducting monthly connect Metrics discussion Playing a key role as a SPOC for my team in case of any Adhoc request and Statutory reporting.
FA deals with asset capitalization, asset transfer, asset disposal, asset cost adjustment and CIP account reconciliation. Also perform asset depreciation during month end.
Involved in MI Consolidation & MI Audit Involved in Query Solving. Cross-skilled in Different processes Consistent High Quality performance with good productivity.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience as a Finance Analyst, reviewing AUC balance and updating the status of the WBSE's, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Asset Management
skills.explanation: Handled asset capitalization, asset transfer, asset disposal, asset cost adjustment, and CIP account reconciliation, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Led a team with regular catch-up meetings and allocated WBS creation requests, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Connected with onshore business for review and updates, and conducted monthly connect metrics discussions, showing a solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Allocated WBS creation requests and conducted monthly connect metrics discussions, indicating a solid working proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed to perform asset depreciation during month-end, and had consistent high-quality performance with good productivity, showing a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Data Analysis
